title: Ovia: Fertility, Cycle, Health
description: Whether you're tracking your period, trying to get pregnant, or tracking your health, join millions worldwide and download the Ovia app. Manage your overall reproductive health, understand your menstrual cycle, get period and ovulation predictions, follow perimenopause symptoms, seek menopause support, track your overall health, and more! We use proprietary algorithms based on cutting-edge fertility research to help you track your menstrual cycle, predict ovulation, and timer intercourse or introduction of sperm. Our algorithm is even an accurate predictor for those with irregular periods. Best of all, the app is free! YOUR HEALTH IN YOUR HANDS ◆ Fertile window and ovulation time predictions and a daily fertility score. Ovia is an ovulation app that helps you know when you’re ovulating so you know the best days to try when trying to conceive (TTC). ◆ Track your basal body temperature, cervical fluid and position, medications etc., in your app calendar. ◆ Receive menstrual data feedback & real-time health alerts based on your symptoms. ◆ Our menopause support program offers symptom tracking, education, and support to navigate perimenopause and menopause confidently. Access preparation guides, symptom management tools, mental health support and more. ◆ Daily TTC tips and period cycle insights delivered to your timeline. ◆ Access over 2,000 free expert articles on fertility, ovulation, conception & reproductive health. ◆ Ask and answer questions anonymously in Ovia’s fertility tracker Community. TRACK YOUR MENSTRUAL CYCLE ◆ Support for regular & irregular menstrual cycles. The more data you enter, the more accurately Ovia Fertility Tracker can predict your period and ovulation. ◆ Customizable data logging to track what's most relevant to you — choose from a variety of categories including symptoms, moods, sex, nutrition etc. Ovia Fertility Tracker is not only a period tracker, it also helps track your overall health! OTHER FEATURE OUR MEMBERS LOVE ◆ HEALTH SUMMARIES & STATISTICS: Ovia’s comprehensive ovulation app provides you a summary of your menstrual cycle and ovulation times data, including your average period length, top symptoms, days of intercourse & more. Check your Fertility Chart to view trends & learn even more about your fertility and the best time to try to conceive! ◆ SHARING & CALENDAR SYNCING: Export your cycle data as a spreadsheet and share with your partner. You can also protect your account with a PIN number. ◆ APPLE HEALTH & FITBIT INTEGRATIONS: Share your tracked cycle data from Ovia to the Apple Health app. Sync your Fitbit to share steps, sleep & weight with Ovia Fertility Tracker. OVIA HEALTH In partnership with organizations that share our goal of helping families live happier, healthier lives, we're proud to offer Ovia Health, a maternity benefit supporting women and families at home and work. Do you have Ovia Health as a benefit through an employer or health plan? Download Ovia Fertility Tracker and enter your health plan information to access premium tools and features. These may include health coaching, personalized content, and health programs such as birth control tracking, endometriosis education, PCOS management, male fertility, and more. ABOUT US Ovia Health is a digital health company that uses mobile technology to help individuals & families live happier, healthier lives. The Ovia Health apps helped 15 million families on their fertility, pregnancy, and parenting journeys. CUSTOMER SERVICE We're always working to improve your experience with our products. Email us at support@oviahealth.com
descriptionHTML:
Whether you're tracking your period, trying to get pregnant, or tracking your health, join millions worldwide and download the Ovia app. Manage your overall reproductive health, understand your menstrual cycle, get period and ovulation predictions, follow perimenopause symptoms, seek menopause support, track your overall health, and more!

We use proprietary algorithms based on cutting-edge fertility research to help you track your menstrual cycle, predict ovulation, and timer intercourse or introduction of sperm. Our algorithm is even an accurate predictor for those with irregular periods. Best of all, the app is free!

YOUR HEALTH IN YOUR HANDS
◆ Fertile window and ovulation time predictions and a daily fertility score. Ovia is an ovulation app that helps you know when you’re ovulating so you know the best days to try when trying to conceive (TTC).
◆ Track your basal body temperature, cervical fluid and position, medications etc., in your app calendar.
◆ Receive menstrual data feedback & real-time health alerts based on your symptoms.
◆ Our menopause support program offers symptom tracking, education, and support to navigate perimenopause and menopause confidently. Access preparation guides, symptom management tools, mental health support and more.
◆ Daily TTC tips and period cycle insights delivered to your timeline.
◆ Access over 2,000 free expert articles on fertility, ovulation, conception & reproductive health.
◆ Ask and answer questions anonymously in Ovia’s fertility tracker Community.

TRACK YOUR MENSTRUAL CYCLE
◆ Support for regular & irregular menstrual cycles. The more data you enter, the more accurately Ovia Fertility Tracker can predict your period and ovulation.
◆ Customizable data logging to track what's most relevant to you — choose from a variety of categories including symptoms, moods, sex, nutrition etc. Ovia Fertility Tracker is not only a period tracker, it also helps track your overall health!

OTHER FEATURE OUR MEMBERS LOVE
◆ HEALTH SUMMARIES & STATISTICS: Ovia’s comprehensive ovulation app provides you a summary of your menstrual cycle and ovulation times data, including your average period length, top symptoms, days of intercourse & more. Check your Fertility Chart to view trends & learn even more about your fertility and the best time to try to conceive!
◆ SHARING & CALENDAR SYNCING: Export your cycle data as a spreadsheet and share with your partner. You can also protect your account with a PIN number.
◆ APPLE HEALTH & FITBIT INTEGRATIONS: Share your tracked cycle data from Ovia to the Apple Health app. Sync your Fitbit to share steps, sleep & weight with Ovia Fertility Tracker.

OVIA HEALTH
In partnership with organizations that share our goal of helping families live happier, healthier lives, we're proud to offer Ovia Health, a maternity benefit supporting women and families at home and work.
Do you have Ovia Health as a benefit through an employer or health plan? Download Ovia Fertility Tracker and enter your health plan information to access premium tools and features. These may include health coaching, personalized content, and health programs such as birth control tracking, endometriosis education, PCOS management, male fertility, and more.

ABOUT US
Ovia Health is a digital health company that uses mobile technology to help individuals & families live happier, healthier lives. The Ovia Health apps helped 15 million families on their fertility, pregnancy, and parenting journeys.

CUSTOMER SERVICE
We're always working to improve your experience with our products. Email us at support@oviahealth.com
summary: Period, ovulation & fertility, & menopause tracker with menstrual cycle calendar
